longBusinessSummary: FTAC Zeus Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was formerly known as FTAC Hera Acquisition Corp. and changed its name to FTAC Zeus Acquisition Corp. in February 2021. FTAC Zeus Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
